definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: After studying English ( Afier he studied English), he got a small job at film studio.
sentences.chinese: 學習英語之後，他在一家電影製片廠找了一份小工。

sentences.english: But Pinewood hopes to break this on Saturday with the Tom Cruise film, which was made at the site in the 1990s.
sentences.chinese: 但是松林製片廠希望在週六打破這個記錄。

sentences.english: The head of the studio always hated my guts and now he's paying me off.
sentences.chinese: 製片廠的頭一直恨我入骨，現在他要發清工資解僱我。

sentences.english: Now it appears it has a studio that will get it into theaters.
sentences.chinese: 現在看來已經有製片廠願意把它推廣到院線。

sentences.english: The production unit of the Beijing Film Studio will leave Beijing for other parts of the country to film the exterior next month.
sentences.chinese: 北京電影製片廠攝製組下個月去外地拍外景。

sentences.english: Beijing Film Studio 80's former Deputy Factory Manager.
sentences.chinese: 80年代曾任北京電影製片廠副廠長。

sentences.english: Hollywood has a laissez-passer to China's first foundry of filmmaking.
sentences.chinese: 好萊塢擁有一張通往中國首個電影製片廠的通行證。

sentences.english: Shepperton Studios, London, on a bleak December day.
sentences.chinese: 謝伯頓製片廠，倫敦，十二月寒風刺骨的一天。

sentences.english: The movie 'Artist Zhu Qizhan' was completed by Shanghai Animation Film Studio.
sentences.chinese: 電影《畫家朱屺瞻》由上海美術電影製片廠攝製完成。

sentences.english: An animated cartoon made by Shanghai Animation Film Studio in 1983.
sentences.chinese: 上海美術電影製片廠83年小時候的片子。

sentences.english: Miao Yue, female, is a first-class director of China.
sentences.chinese: 苗月，女，峨眉電影製片廠國家一級導演。

sentences.english: Many movie studios wanted to buy the exclusive rights to the story.
sentences.chinese: 很多電影製片廠想要買下這個故事的獨佔權。

sentences.english: Wang Bing has just started working at a film studio.
sentences.chinese: 王冰剛剛開始在電影製片廠裏工作。

sentences.english: At Changchun, you will visit the Movie Studio and the Pure Moon Pool park.
sentences.chinese: 先在長春參觀電影製片廠和淨月潭公園。

sentences.english: In Hollywood, no one dare to tell you which picture will make money for studios.
sentences.chinese: 在好萊塢，沒人敢告訴你哪部片能讓製片廠賺大錢。
製片廠覺得那樣太“消極。

definition: lit. to directly attack Huanglong/fig. to directly combat the root of a problem
lit. an arrow at the end of its flight (idiom)/fig. spent force
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: strong in appearance but weak in reality (idiom)
East Turkestan Liberation Organization (ETLO), Chinese dissident group/abbr. for 東突厥斯坦解放組織|东突厥斯坦解放组织
to charge/to pounce on/to swoop down on
lit. to use the eastern wind (idiom)/fig. to use sb's help
half a life/only half alive/barely alive/(scared, beaten etc) half to death
